description: This file defines a React functional component called NotesList that renders a list of notes with features for selection and deletion. It includes imports for utility functions formatDate and truncate from an external utils module.

methods.name: NotesList({ notes, selectedId, onSelect, onDelete })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a list of notes with controls for selecting and deleting notes. It displays the notes, highlights the selected note, and includes accessibility features.

ctags.name: NotesList
ctags.pattern: /^export default function NotesList({ notes, selectedId, onSelect, onDelete }) {$/
